namespaces.namespace: Simpson Wiki (Triple Store Connector Test) talk

revision.text:
This is the 'uploadTemplate' template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{uploadTemplate
|Filename=
|CopyrightBy=
|CreationDate=
|Uploader=
|UploadDate=
|RelatedArticles=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. {| class="wikitable" width="100%" align="left" style="border: 1px solid black" ! width="10%" align="left" | Filename: |align="left" | [[HasFilename::{{{Filename|}}}]] |- ! width="10%" align="left" | Copyright by: |align="left" | [[HasCopyrightBy::{{{CopyrightBy|}}}]] |- ! width="10%" align="left" | Creation date: |align="left" | [[HasCreationDate::{{{CreationDate|}}}]] |- ! width="10%" align="left" | Uploaded by: |align="left" | [[HasUploader::{{{Uploader|}}}]] |- ! width="10%" align="left" | Upload date: |align="left" | [[HasUploadDate::{{{UploadDate|}}}]] |- ! width="10%" align="left" | Related articles: |align="left" | [[HasRelatedArticles::{{{RelatedArticles|}}}]] |} [[Category:Media]]

This is the 'RMImage' template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{RMImage
|Filename=
|CopyrightBy=
|CreationDate=

Edit the page to see the template text. {| |- |Meta data |- {| class="wikitable" width="100%" align="left" style="border: 1px solid #AAAAAA" ! width="10%" align="left" | Filename: |align="left" | [[HasFilename::{{{Filename|}}}]] |- ! width="10%" align="left" | Copyright by: |align="left" | [[HasCopyrightBy::{{{CopyrightBy|}}}]] |- ! width="10%" align="left" | Creation date: |align="left" | [[HasCreationDate::{{{CreationDate|}}}]] |- ! width="10%" align="left" | Uploaded by: |align="left" | [[HasUploader::{{{Uploader|}}}]] |- ! width="10%" align="left" | Upload date: |align="left" | [[HasUploadDate::{{{UploadDate|}}}]] |- ! width="10%" align="left" | Related articles: |align="left" | [[HasRelatedArticles::{{{RelatedArticles|}}}]] |} |- |  |} [[Category:Image]]

{| border="1" style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0px; border-collapse: collapse;" | align="center" bgcolor="#3C6EE6" style="padding: 0px;" | Attached documents, images and media [{{fullurl:{{{1}}}|action=purge}} refresh] {| class="wikitable sortable" border="0" style="padding: 0px;" |- bgcolor="lightgrey" ! align="center" class="unsortable" | Category !! Filename !! Uploaded by !! Creation date !! class="unsortable" | Infos !! class="unsortable" | Delete |- {{#ask: [[Category:Media]][[HasRelatedArticles::{{{1}}}]] | ?HasFilename | ?HasUploader | ?HasCreationDate | format=template | template=RMListInnerTable | link=none }} |} |- | align="right" style="padding: 0px;" | {{#rmf: {{{1}}} }} |}

|- | align="center" | [{{fullurl:Special:FilePath/{{{1}}}}} {{RMCategoryLinkIcon|{{{1}}}}}] || [{{fullurl:{{{1}}}|action=formedit}} {{{2}}}] || [[{{{3}}}]] |sortkey={{Date|{{{4}}}|iso}}}| {{{4}}} | align="center" | [{{fullurl:{{{1}}}}} {{SERVER}}/skins/common/images/icons/smw_plus_info_icon_16x16.png] | align="center" | [{{fullurl:{{{1}}}|action=delete}} {{SERVER}}/skins/common/images/icons/smw_plus_delete_icon_16x16.png]

<noinclude>
This is the 'RMUpload' form.
To add a page with this form, enter the page name below;
if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page.

{{#forminput:RMUpload}}

</noinclude><includeonly>
{{{for template|RMUpload}}}
{| width="100%" align="center"  
|-
| width="30%" |
| width="70%" |
|-
| align="right" | Uploaded by:
| {{{field|Uploader|mandatory|default=current user|size=40|maxlength=40}}}
|-
| align="right" | Copyright by:
| {{{field|CopyrightBy|size=40|maxlenght=40}}}
|-
| align="right" | Creation date:
| {{{field|CreationDate|default=now}}}
|-
| style="display:none"| {{{field|UploadDate|mandatory|default=now}}}
|-
| {{{field|RelatedArticles|hidden}}}
|-
| {{{field|Filename|hidden}}}
|}
{{{end template}}}
</includeonly>
